content: Comments made to issues in the Git repository used to show up here. They're not anymore. Was that a conscious decision?
hmmmm. Actually, they showed up in the cds hooks/github stream. I don't think it was a conscious decision. The last automated post was on Jan 30th. Was that when zulip hosting migrated ?

Kevin's got a zulip bot named Travis CI, the .travis.yml pushes posts to the cds hooks/committers stream, but I'm not sure how the cds hooks/github stream is supposed to be receiving updates. @Kevin Shekleton - will you look at this when you have a sec?
